description: red oval shaped bank with removable lid; coin-like round center in gold with profile of George VI and Elizabeth in black with text in black; gold thistle; 3 shamrocks; daffodil and flower around images; gold initials with gold crown above in back; gold and red bands around bottom
inscription:
Inscriptions

on bottom, in black: [Coronation / Souvenir Money Box / containing 11 6 OXO CUBES / Brand Oxo Ltd., Thames House, / London, England]; on front, in black: [George VI and Elizabeth May 12th 1937]
object_name: "George VI Coronation Souvenir Money Box" still bank
title: "George VI Coronation Souvenir Money Box" still bank
